Text:
dude, here you go

Handbook Of Indian Sociology
by Veena Das


The Oxford India Companion to Sociology and Social Anthropology
by Veena Das

This is not the first time I'm getting Veena Das book request. The response against that is SORRY as of now.

Regarding 'Daniel Goleman', I have 'Emotional Intelligence' and three other titles, but all in POLISH language and I don't think that will serve you much. If you want I can manage to provide audiobook of the same title ...

Or, may be, I'm not the uploader you are looking for. Sorry.
